title: Do Dia de los Muertos and National Remembrance Day for Americans Killed by ‘Illegal Aliens’ Fall on Same Day?
subtitle: U.S. President Donald Trump issued a proclamation naming Nov. 1 a national remembrance day for those who had been killed by "illegal aliens."
author: Dan Evon
vclaim: U.S. President Donald Trump signed a proclamation declaring November 1, the same day as the Mexican holiday Dia de los Muertos, as the National Day of Remembrance for Americans Killed by "Illegal Aliens."
